attributes.action: Counter-Petition: Babar Ahmad petition contains fake signatures
attributes.additional_details:
Many people are claiming to be able to sign by using false details in the comments this YouTube video: /watch?v=jsYxwQZiTkA

For a short period, the top rated comment had addresses in the UK witch you could use to sign the petition from other countries.

The amount of signatures was at 73k when this video was posted 3 days ago, now they are at 111k.

By using our addresses to sign this petition they are showing dis-respect toward the british public and our democratic system.

To discourage this behaviour in the future, the government should question legitimacy of this petition, on these grounds, during its parliamentary debate.
